## Open-Source Software

- **[jaxDecomp](https://github.com/DifferentiableUniverseInitiative/jaxDecomp)** — **Author**. JAX based code for multi-GPU 3D domain decomposition and distributed FFTs (NCCL); scales cosmology workloads on GPU clusters.
- **[JaxPM](https://github.com/DifferentiableUniverseInitiative/JaxPM)** — **Main contributor/Maintainer**. Differentiable particle-mesh simulations in JAX; multi-accelerator support for scalable forward modeling and gradient-based inference.
- **[FURAX](https://github.com/CMBSciPol/furax)** — **Main contributor/Maintainer**. JAX building blocks for inverse problems; used for CMB component separation at Simons Observatory.
- **[jax-healpy](https://github.com/CMBSciPol/jax-healpy)** — **Main contributor/Maintainer**. JAX-native HEALPix utilities for CMB/spherical data; GPU- and autodiff-ready.
- **[jax-grid-search](https://github.com/ASKabalan/jax-grid-search)** — **Author**. Distributed grid search and gradient-based optimization on JAX/Optax.

**Contributions**  
- **[S2FFT](https://github.com/astro-informatics/s2fft)** — **Contributor**. Differentiable spherical & Wigner transforms (JAX/PyTorch). *Contribution:* CUDA spherical harmonics to reduce JAX JIT time.
